description: This Mutyala Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The combination of lustrous pearls, a magnificent carved emerald, and the unmatched brilliance of Polki diamonds makes this piece a true heirloom. The Hyderabadi pearl stringing technique ensures long-lasting beauty, and the timeless design will be cherished for generations. The piece seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
